simple_solve:
%s The result of your operation is:

%s
simple_multi_solve:
%s The end result of your operation chain is:

%s
solver_info:
%s I was upgraded with a simple interface for Algebrite to solve calculations for you.
Use "solve (expression)" to solve a single expression.
For multiple expressions use "solve multi" and seperate each expression with ",".
Please refer to http://algebrite.org/ to learn about my capabilities. %s
solver_no_output: %s Your last operation doesn't return a value.
